example.eg: She drew the outline of her hand on the paper.
example.egtrans: 她在纸上描出自己手的轮廓。

example.eg: He outlined his hand on the paper.
example.egtrans: 他在纸上描出自己手的轮廓。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 画…的外形, 给…画轮廓

example.eg: Let me outline my ideas for you.
example.egtrans: 让我给你大概讲述一下我的想法。

example.eg: The artist sketched an outline of the model.
example.egtrans: 画家速写出了模特的外形。

example.eg: I'll tell you the general outline of our development plans.
example.egtrans: 我会告诉你我们发展规划的概略。

example.eg: He didn't write his speech word for word. He would just write the outline.
example.egtrans: 他不会逐字逐句写完自己的演讲稿，只会写个大纲。

example.eg: First write an outline, and when your research is complete, a more detailed text.
example.egtrans: 首先，写个草稿，待你调查研究结束后，再填补细节，写一篇更详备的文章。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 总体来说, 整体来看

example.eg: I like your idea in outline but would like some time to study the details.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 简明扼要地, 提纲式地, 梗概地

example.eg: I quickly drew a rough outline of an eye.
Here's a rough outline of the proposed web site, but it still needs refining.
